Translations.Text: Ibrahima balalah he prerita pheresatagana, tomadera uddesya ki
tara balalah amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi
yate tadera upara matira dhila niksepa kari.
Ya simatikramakaridera jan'ye apanara palanakartara kache cihiߦ#2468; ache.
Atahpara sekhane yara imanadara chila, ami taderake ud'dhara karalama.
Ebam sekhane ekati grha byatita kona musalamana ami pa'ini.
Yara yantranadayaka sastike bhaya kare, ami tadera jan'ye sekhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi.
Ebam nidarsana rayeche musara brttante; yakhana ami take suspasta pramanasaha phera'unera kache prerana karechilama.
Atahpara se saktibale mukha phiriye nila ebam balalah se haya yadukara, na haya pagala.
Atahpara ami take o tara senabahinike pakara'o karalama ebam taderake samudre niksepa karalama. Se chila abhiyukta.
Ebam nidarsana rayeche tadera kahinite; yakhana ami tadera upara prerana karechilama asubha bayu.
E'i bayu yara upara diye prabahita hayechilah take'i curna-bicurna kare diyechila.
Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera ghatanaya; yakhana taderake bala hayechila, kichukala maja lute na'o.
Atahpara tara tadera palanakartara adesa aman'ya karala ebam tadera prati bajraghata hala ematabasthaya ye, tara ta dekhechila.
Atahpara tara damrate saksama hala na ebam kona pratikara'o karate parala na.
Ami itipurbe nuhera sampradayake dhbansa karechi. Niscita'i tara chila papacari sampradaya.
Ami sbiya ksamatabale akasa nirmana karechi ebam ami abasya'i byapaka ksamatasali.
Ami bhumike bichiyechi. Ami kata sundarabhabe'i na bichate saksama.
Ami pratyeka bastu joraya joraya srsti karechi, yate tomara hrdayangama kara.
Ata'eba, allahara dike dhabita ha'o. Ami tamra tarapha theke tomadera jan'ye suspasta satarkakari.
Tomara allahara sathe kona upasya sabyasta karo na. Ami tamra paksa theke tomadera jan'ya suspasta satarkakari.
Emanibhabe, tadera purbabartidera kache yakhana'i kona rasula agamana kareche, tara balacheh yadukara, na haya um'mada.
Tara ki eke aparake e'i upadesa'i diye geche? Bastutah ora dusta sampradaya.
Ata'eba, apani odera theke mukha phiriye nina. Ete apani aparadhi habena na.
Ebam bojhate thakuna; kenana, bojhano muminadera upakare asabe.
Amara ebadata karara jan'ya'i ami manaba o jina jati srsti karechi.
Ami tadera kache jibika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake aharya yogabe.
Allaha ta’ala'i to jibikadata saktira adhara, parakranta.
Ata'eba, e'i yalemadera prapya ta'i, ya odera atita sahacaradera prapya chila. Kaje'i ora yena amara kache ta taratari na caya.
Ata'eba, kapheradera jan'ye durbhoga se'i dinera, yedinera pratisruti oderake deya hayeche.

na tadera kona simri ache, yate arohana kare tara srabana kare? Thakale tadera srota suspasta pramana upasthita karuka.

na tara cakranta karate caya? Ata'eba yara kaphera, tara'i cakrantera sikara habe.
Na tadera allaha ta’ala byatita kona upasya ache? Tara yake sarika kare, allaha ta’ala ta theke pabitra.
Tara yadi akasera kona khandake patita hate dekhe, tabe bale eta to punjibhuta megha.
Taderake chere dina sedina paryanta, yedina tadera upara bajraghata patita habe.
Sedina tadera cakranta tadera kona upakare asabe na ebam tara sahayyaprapta'o habe na.
Gonahagaradera jan'ye echara ara'o sasti rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na.

Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
tathaya ache udbelita du'i prasrabana.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
tathaya ache phala-mula, kharjura o anara.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
sekhane thakabe saccaritra sundari ramanigana.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
tambute abasthanakarini huragana.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
kona jina o manaba purbe taderake sparsa kareni.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
tara sabuja masanade ebam utkrsta mulyabana bichanaya helana diye basabe.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
kata punyamaya apanara palanakartara nama, yini mahimamaya o mahanubhaba.
Yakhana kiyamatera ghatana ghatabe
yara bastabataya kona sansaya ne'i.
Eta nicu kare debe, samunnata kare debe.
Yakhana prabalabhabe prakampita habe prthibi.
Ebam parbatamala bhenge curamara haye yabe.
Atahpara ta haye yabe utksipta dhulikana.
Ebam tomara tinabhabe bibhakta haye parabe.
Yara dana dike, kata bhagyabana tara.
Ebam yara bamadike, kata hatabhaga tara.
Agrabartigana to agrabarti'i.
Tara'i naikatyasila
abadanera udyanasamuhe
tara ekadala purbabartidera madhya theke.
Ebam alpasankhyaka parabartidera madhye theke.
Sbarna khacita sinhasana.
Tara tate helana diye basabe paraspara mukhomukhi haye.
Tadera kache ghoraphera karabe cira kisorera.
Panapatra kumja o khamti surapurna peyala hate niye
ya pana karale tadera sirahpira habe na ebam bikaragrasta o habe na.
Ara tadera pachandamata phala-mula niye
ebam rucimata pakhira mansa niye.
Tathaya thakabe anatanayana huragana
abarane raksita motira n'yaya
tara ya kichu karata, tara puraskarasbarupa.
Tara tathaya abantara o kona kharapa katha sunabe na.
Kintu sunabe salama ara salama.
Yara dana dike thakabe, tara kata bhagyabana.
Tara thakabe kamtabihina badarika brkse.
Ebam kamdi kamdi kalaya
ebam dirgha chayaya.
Ebam prabahita panite
o pracura phala-mule
ya sesa habara naya ebam nisid'dha o naya
ara thakabe samunnata sayyaya.
Ami jannati ramaniganake bisesarupe srsti karechi.
Atahpara taderake karechi cirakumari.
Kamini, samabayaska.
Dana dikera lokadera jan'ye.
Tadera ekadala habe purbabartidera madhya theke.
Ebam ekadala parabartidera madhya theke.
Bamaparsbastha loka, kata na hatabhaga tara.
Tara thakabe prakhara baspe ebam uttapta panite
ebam dhumrakunjera chayaya.
Ya sitala naya ebam aramadayaka'o naya.
Tara itipurbe sbacchandyasila chila.
Tara sadasarbada ghoratara papakarme dube thakata.
Tara balatah amara yakhana mare asthi o mrttikaya parinata haye yaba, takhana'o ki punarut'thita haba
ebam amadera purbapurusagana'o
balunah purbabarti o parabartigana
saba'i ekatrita habe eka nirdista dinera nirdista samaye.
Atahpara he pathabhrasta, mithyaropakarigana.
Tomara abasya'i bhaksana karabe yakkuma brksa theke
atahpara ta dbara udara purna karabe
atahpara tara upara pana karabe uttapta pani.
Pana karabe pipasita utera n'yaya.
Keyamatera dina eta'i habe tadera apyayana.
Ami srsti karechi tomaderake. Atahpara kena tomara ta satya bale bisbasa kara na.
Tomara ki bhebe dekhecha, tomadera biryapata samparke.
Tomara take srsti kara, na ami srsti kari
ami tomadera mrtyukala nirdharita karechi ebam ami aksama na'i.
E byapare ye, tomadera paribarte tomadera mata lokake niye asi ebam tomaderake emana kare de'i, ya tomara jana na.
Tomara abagata hayecha prathama srsti samparke, tabe tomara anudhabana kara na kena
tomara ye bija bapana kara, se samparke bhebe dekhecha ki
tomara take utpanna kara, na ami utpannakari
ami iccha karale take kharakuta kare dite pari, atahpara haye yabe tomara bismayabista.
Balabeh amara to rnera cape pare gelama
baram amara huta sarbasba haye paralama.
Tomara ye pani pana kara, se samparke bhebe dekhecha ki
tomara ta megha theke namiye ana, na ami barsana kari
ami iccha karale take lona kare dite pari, atahpara tomara kena krtajnata prakasa kara na
tomara ye agni prajjbalita kara, se samparke bhebe dekhecha ki
tomara ki era brksa srsti karecha, na ami srsti karechi
ami se'i brksake karechi smaranika ebam marubasidera jan'ya samagri.
Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana palanakartara name pabitrata ghosana karuna.
Ata'eba, ami tarakarajira astacalera sapatha karachi
niscaya eta eka maha sapatha-yadi tomara janate.
Niscaya eta sam'manita kora'ana
ya ache eka gopana kitabe
yara paka-pabitra, tara byatita an'ya ke'u eke sparsa karabe na.
Eta bisba-palanakartara paksa theke abatirna.
Tabu'o ki tomara e'i banira prati saithilya padarsana karabe
ebam eke mithya balake'i tomara tomadera bhumikaya parinata karabe
atahpara yakhana kara'o prana kanthagata haya.
Ebam tomara takiye thaka
takhana ami tomadera apeksa tara adhika nikate thaki; kintu tomara dekha na.
Yadi tomadera hisaba-kitaba na ha'oya'i thika haya
tabe tomara e'i atmake phira'o na kena, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o
yadi se naikatyasiladera ekajana haya
tabe tara jan'ye ache sukha, uttama riyika ebam neyamate bhara udyana.
Ara yadi se dana parsbasthadera ekajana haya
tabe take bala habeh tomara jan'ye danaparsbasasthadera paksa theke salama.
Ara yadi se pathabhrasta mithyaropakaridera ekajana haya
tabe tara apyayana habe uttapta pani dbara.
Ebam se niksipta habe agnite.
Eta dhruba satya.
Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana palanakartara name pabitrata ghosana karuna.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kare. Tini saktidhara; prajnamaya.
Nabhomandala o bhumandalera rajatba tamra'i. Tini jibana dana karena o mrtyu ghatana. Tini sabakichu karate saksama.
Tini'i prathama, tini'i sarbasesa, tini'i prakasamana o aprakasamana ebam tini saba bisaye samyaka parijnata.

Tini nabhomandala o bhu-mandala srsti karechena chayadine, atahpara arasera upara samasina hayechena. Tini janena ya bhumite prabesa kare o ya bhumi theke nirgata haya ebam ya akasa theke barsita haya o ya akase ut'thita haya. Tini tomadera sathe achena tomara yekhane'i thaka. Tomara ya kara, allaha ta dekhena.
Nabhomandala o bhumandalera rajatba tamra'i. Sabakichu tamra'i dike pratyabartana karabe.
Tini ratrike dibase prabista karena ebam dibasake prabista karena ratrite. Tini antarera bisayadi samparke'o samyaka jnata.

Tomara allaha o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara ebam tini tomaderake yara uttaradhikari karechena, ta theke byaya kara. Ata'eba, tomadera madhye yara bisbasa sthapana kare o byaya kare, tadera jan'ye rayeche mahapuraskara.

Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allahara prati bisbasa sthapana karacha na, athaca rasula tomaderake tomadera palanakartara prati bisbasa sthapana karara da'oyata dicchena? Allaha to purbe'i tomadera angikara niyechena-yadi tomara bisbasi ha'o.
Tini'i tamra dasera prati prakasya ayata abatirna karena, yate tomaderake andhakara theke aloke anayana karena. Niscaya allaha tomadera prati karunamaya, parama dayalu.

Tomaderake allahara pathe byaya karate kise badha deya, yakhana allaha'i nabhomandala o bhumandalera uttaradhikari? Tomadera madhye ye makka bijayera purbe byaya kareche o jehada kareche, se samana naya. Erupa lokadera maryada bara tadera apeksa, yara pare byaya kareche o jehada kareche. Tabe allaha ubhayake kalyanera oyada diyechena. Tomara ya kara, allaha se samparke samyaka jnata.
Ke se'i byakti, ye allahake uttama dhara dibe, erapara tini tara jan'ye ta bahugune brd'dhi karabena ebam tara jan'ye rayeche sam'manita puraskara.

Yedina apani dekhabena imanadara purusa o imanadara nariderake, tadera sam'mukha bhage o danaparsbe tadera jyoti chutochuti karabe bala habeh aja tomadera jan'ye susambada jannatera, yara taladese nadi prabahita, tate tara cirakala thakabe. Eta'i mahasaphalya.

Yedina kapata bisbasi purusa o kapata bisbasini narira muminaderake balabeh tomara amadera jan'ye apeksa kara, amara'o kichu alo niba tomadera jyoti theke. Bala habeh tomara pichane phire ya'o o alora khomja kara. Atahpara ubhaya dalera majhakhane khara kara habe ekati pracira, yara ekati daraja habe. Tara abhyantare thakabe rahamata ebam ba'ire thakabe ayaba.

Tara muminaderake deke balabeh amara ki tomadera sathe chilama na? Tara balabeh hamya kintu tomara nijera'i nijederake bipadagrasta karecha. Pratiksa karecha, sandeha posana karecha ebam alika asara pechane bibhranta hayecha, abasese allahara adesa paumcheche. E'i saba'i tomaderake allaha samparke pratarita kareche.

Ata'eba, aja tomadera kacha theke kona muktipana grahana kara habe na. Ebam kapheradera kacha theke'o naya. Tomadera sabara abasthala jahannama. Seta'i tomadera sangi. Kata'i na nikrsta e'i pratyabartana sthala.

Yara mumina, tadera jan'ye ki allahara smarane ebam ye satya abartirna hayeche, tara karane hrdaya bigalita ha'oyara samaya aseni? Tara tadera mata yena na haya, yaderake purbe kitaba deya hayechila. Tadera upara sudirghakala atikranta hayeche, atahpara tadera antahkarana kathina haye geche. Tadera adhikansa'i papacari.
Tomara jene rakha, allaha'i bhu-bhagake tara mrtyura para punarujjibita karena. Ami pariskarabhabe tomadera jan'ye ayatagulo byakta karechi, yate tomara bojha.
Niscaya danasila byakti o danasila nari, yara allahake uttamarupe dhara deya, taderake deya habe bahuguna ebam tadera jan'ye rayeche sam'manajanaka puraskara.

Ara yara allaha o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kare tara'i tadera palanakartara kache siddika o sahida bale bibecita. Tadera jan'ye rayeche puraskara o jyoti ebam yara kaphera o amara nidarsana asbikarakari tara'i jahannamera adhibasi habe.

Tomara jene rakha, parthiba jibana krira-kautuka, saja-sajja, parasparika ahamika ebam dhana o janera pracurya byatita ara kichu naya, yemana eka brstira abastha, yara sabuja phasala krsakaderake camatkrta kare, erapara ta sukiye yaya, phale tumi take pitabarna dekhate pa'o, erapara ta kharakuta haye yaya. Ara parakale ache kathina sasti ebam allahara ksama o santusti. Parthiba jibana prataranara upakarana bai kichu naya.

Tomara agre dhabita ha'o tomadera palanakartara ksama o se'i jannatera dike, ya akasa o prthibira mata prasasta. Eta prastuta kara hayeche allaha o tamra rasulaganera prati bisbasasthapanakaridera jan'ye. Eta allahara krpa, tini yake iccha, eta dana karena. Allaha mahana krpara adhikari.
Prthibite ebam byaktigatabhabe tomadera upara kona bipada ase na; kintu ta jagata srstira purbe'i kitabe lipibad'dha ache. Niscaya eta allahara pakse sahaja.
Eta ejan'ye bala haya, yate tomara ya hara'o tajjan'ye duhkhita na ha'o ebam tini tomaderake ya diyechena, tajjan'ye ullasita na ha'o. Allaha kona ud'dhata ahankarike pachanda karena na
yara krpanata kare ebam manusake krpanatara prati utsaha deya, ye mukha phiriye neya, tara jana ucita ye, allaha abhabamukta, prasansita.

Ami amara rasulaganake suspasta nidarsanasaha prerana karechi ebam tamdera sathe abatirna karechi kitaba o n'yayaniti, yate manusa inasapha pratistha kare. Ara ami nayila karechi lauha, yate ache pracanda ranasakti ebam manusera bahubidha upakara. Eta ejan'ye ye, allaha jene nibena ke na dekhe tamke o tamra rasulaganake sahayya kare. Allaha saktidhara, parakramasali.

Ami nuha o ibrahimake rasularupe prerana karechi ebam tadera bansadharera madhye nabu'oyata o kitaba abyahata rekhechi. Atahpara tadera kataka satpathaprapta hayeche ebam adhikansa'i hayeche papacari.

Atahpara ami tadera pascate prerana karechi amara rasulaganake ebam tadera anugami karechi mariyama tanaya isake o take diyechi injila. Ami tara anusaridera antare sthapana karechi namrata o daya. Ara bairagya, se to tara nijera'i udbhabana kareche; ami eta tadera upara pharaja karini; kintu tara allahara santusti labhera jan'ye eta abalambana kareche. Atahpara tara yathayathabhabe ta palana kareni. Tadera madhye yara bisbasi chila, ami taderake tadera prapya puraskara diyechi. Ara tadera adhikansa'i papacari.

Muminagana, tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara. Tini nije anugrahera dbiguna ansa tomaderake dibena, tomaderake dibena jyoti, yara sahayye tomara calabe ebam tomaderake ksama karabena. Allaha ksamasila, dayamaya.
Yate kitabadharira jane ye, allahara saman'ya anugrahera upara o tadera kona ksamata ne'i, daya allahara'i hate; tini yake iccha, ta dana karena. Allaha maha anugrahasila.
